TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GenericXmlSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

summary.span: 表示基于 XML 的安全令牌。

span.span: Represents a security token that is based upon XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在网络上接收到规范中未定义的令牌，或无法确定安全令牌的类型，则使用 类。Use the class when you receive a token over the wire that is not defined in a specification or there is no way for you to determine the type of the security token. 例如，在联合方案下，向安全令牌服务 (STS) 发送请求安全令牌 (RST) 时，并不总是知道 STS 将返回哪种类型的安全令牌。For example, in a federation scenario when you send a Request Security Token (RST) to a Security Token Service (STS) you do not always know the type of the security token returned by the STS. 在这种情况下，可以使用 将安全令牌及其内部引用和外部引用存储为 XML。In such cases, you can use a to store the security token as XML along with its internal and external references. 如果内置安全令牌之一不满足需要，则使用 类和 XML 来定义声明。Use the class to define claims using XML when one of the built-in security tokens does not suffice. 其他安全令牌可以使用 XML 来定义其声明，但 安全令牌通常允许安全令牌具有应用程序定义的 XML 集。Other security tokens can define their claims using XML, however the security token generically allows a security token to have an application-defined set of XML.

MemberSignature.Value: public GenericXmlSecurityToken (System.Xml.XmlElement tokenXml, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken proofToken, DateTime effectiveTime, DateTime expirationTime, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause internalTokenReference, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause externalTokenReference, System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> authorizationPolicies);

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `internalTokenReference` 参数为 `null`，则为此安全令牌创建一个 密钥标识符子句并将其设置为 属性。When the `internalTokenReference` parameter is `null`, a key identifier clause is created for this security token and set to the property. 如果在联合方案下获得 ，则证明令牌包含为客户端加密的密钥。When the is obtained in a federation scenario, the proof token contains the key that is encrypted for the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 安全令牌序列化为 XML，则 `Id` 属性 (Attribute) 的值设置为 属性 (Property) 的值。When the security token is serialized into XML, the value of the `Id` attribute is set to the value of the property.

summary.span: 获取安全令牌的证明令牌。

span.span: Gets the proof token for the security token.

value.span: 一个 ，表示安全令牌的证明令牌。

span.span: A that represents the proof token for the security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 证明令牌是一种安全令牌，在 安全令牌的请求者获取 安全令牌时，用于进行身份验证。The proof token is the security token that the requester of the security token used for authentication in obtaining the security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全令牌是可扩展的，因此，XML 中包含的确切内容取决于应用程序。The security token is extensible, so exactly what is contained within the XML is application-dependent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 属性可确定 令牌有效的时间段。Use the and properties to determine the time period in which a token is valid. 和 属性分别表示此安全令牌有效的最初时刻和最后时刻。The and properties represent the first and last instants in time in which the security token is valid, respectively. 属性是使用构造函数的 `effectiveTime` 参数指定的。The property is specified using the `effectiveTime` parameter of the constructor. 此属性返回的值总是为协调世界时 (UTC)。The value returned from this property is always in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 属性可确定 令牌有效的时间段。Use the and properties to determine the time period in which a token is valid. 和 属性分别表示此安全令牌有效的最初时刻和最后时刻。The and properties represent the first and last instants in time in which the security token is valid, respectively. 属性是使用构造函数的 `expirationTime` 参数指定的。The property is specified using the `expirationTime` parameter of the constructor. 此属性返回的值总是为协调世界时 (UTC)。The value returned from this property is always in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
